hadith.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The idolators and Quraish came and disputed with the Prophet (ï·º) concerning the Divine Decree. Then the following verse was revealed: 'The Day they will be dragged on their faces into the Fire (it will be said to them): "Taste you the touch of Hell!" Verily We have created all things with Qadar. (Divine Decree)
